<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 8"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Flensing Slice](/Feats.aspx?ID=6310) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=535" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 196 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Archetype** [Dual-Weapon Warrior](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=247)

**Prerequisites**
[Dual-Weapon Warrior Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=6307)

**Requirements**
Your last action was a [Double Slice](/Feats.aspx?ID=4769), and both attacks hit the target.

</column>

---

When you hit with both attacks with Double Slice, you flense the target, making it bleed and creating a weak spot. The target takes 1d8 [persistent bleed damage](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29) per weapon damage die of whichever of the weapons you used that has the most weapon damage dice (maximum 4d8 for a [_major striking_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2829) weapon). In addition, until the start of your next turn the target is [off-guard](/Conditions.aspx?ID=58), and its resistances to any physical damage types are reduced by 5.
